title: Propoganda
review:
In this movie they lie by two phases:
1. 'This guy went from France to Berlin'. The truth is Americans never reached Berlin.
2. 'Rusevelt beat Hilter'. The truth is Russians beat Hitler.
Conclusion: this movie is propaganda and lie.

title: If you call it First Man, it MUST BE about Yuri Gagarin
review: It does not matter what the title means. It is another piece of propaganda to show lie about Americans did everything in Space. In reality most thins were done by Russians. First satellite, first man in space, the first man in open space outside of the spaceship, the first space station, the first satellite on Mars and many many more things.

title: It's exactly happening in 2020 with the virus.
review: In 2020 Coronavirus became the world pandemic. Chinese people were eating all kind of animals using their 'wet markets'. The nature had already punished us in 2003 with SARS coronavirus. The reason of it was the same issue with China eating all kind of animals. Nobody learned the lesson. Now we have it again. After 2020 people should start considering how we treat this planet and if it is good thing to eat animals. This movie was met awfully. You can see the rating and reviews. But it shows how far all these reviewers from the reality. It turned out as a great movie which makes perfect sense.

title: I cried. My favorite movie OF ALL TIME !!!!!
review: The most influential movie I have even seen. Especially if you are a real musician who does not use samples or arpeggiatiors to produce music, this movie is for you. Real temper, real emotions. We all fell the same like this characters. I am watching this move at least 5 times a year. Strongly Suggested!!!!!!!!!!
